channel.title: Command Help
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Im Using A Dev 7.0 Server Source.
I've Got A Bit Of Spare Time On My Hands And I Would Like To Make The Following Commands:
::kill
Sorry I Can't Give What I Have So Far Because I Have Nothing At All :P This Command Is Intended To Kill (playername).
Also
::jail
I Was Told I Have To Declare Something But What? Lolz
Thanx
All Help Is Appreciated! :)

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

When creating the kill commands, add a method which, when the command is used, the playernames hp is set to 0. And whenever I see declare…I see variable…

Read full topic
